name: Space Alien Pop
description:
Explore the Space world in an all-new Match-3 puzzle game!
Mystery and shining planets are waiting for you.

Enjoy the unknown world and match fun.


Game Features
- Easy and simple gameplay
- Swipe, swap, and match planets to crush them
- Slove the space puzzles
- Beautiful arctic scenery
- Test your skills in hundreds of fun

Download this game now to start the space adventure!
